title: "10 Finalists Named in Cowen Startup Challenge; Winner Chosen at Automate June 7"
excerpt: "Competition during North America’s largest automation and robotics showcase, June 6-9, will spotlight cutting-edge technologies driving innovations The 10 finalists—all of which launched under five years ago and have raised less than $5 million since creation—will each pitch their technology solution to a panel of industry expert judges during the June 7 finals."
